overview: After a bad breakup, Wonderful Woman and Superbman, must work together with the super crew to prevent world domination by an invincible super villain from the 5th dimension named Bob. Shot in 1998, this superhero parody stars Lisa Guerrero as Wonderful Woman, Ric Borelli as Superbman and Kevin Glikmann as Bob. Siskel and Ebert would have said, it's so campy the marshmallows cook themselves.
tagline: Before the Justice League their was the Super Crew
title: Super Heroes The Movie
